blogPost.excerpt: Being the first 2-in-1 system for managing dog poop, PooPail makes life easier by scooping waste directly into the pail, then conveniently storing it for up to a week within its compostable and biodegradable bags.
blogPost.body: Being the first 2-in-1 system for managing dog poop, PooPail makes life easier by scooping waste directly into the pail, then conveniently storing it for up to a week within its compostable and biodegradable bags.
blogPost.title: PooPail - The easy 2-in-1 solution to cleaning dog poop
blogPost.author: Norayr Margarian

localize.description: 作为第一个2合1的狗便便管理系统，PooPail让生活变得更简单，直接将废物舀入桶中，然后在其可堆肥和生物降解袋中方便地存储一周。
localize.tagline: 简单的2合1清洁狗粪的解决方案。

localize.description: 作爲第一個2合1的狗便便管理系統，PooPail讓生活變得更簡單，直接將廢物舀入桶中，然後在其可堆肥和生物降解袋中方便地存儲一週。
localize.tagline: 簡單的2合1清潔狗糞的解決方案。

previous.excerpt: The fastest way to make a tailored cover letter. Create a resume, target a job description, and instantly generate a matching cover letter.
previous.title: AI Cover Letter - Generate a tailored cover letter based on your resume

localize.description: 最快的方法，让你量身定做求职信。创建一份简历，锁定一个职位描述，并立即生成一封匹配的求职信。
localize.tagline: 根据你的简历生成一封量身定做的求职信。

localize.description: 最快的方法，讓你量身定做求職信。創建一份簡歷，鎖定一個職位描述，並立即生成一封匹配的求職信。
localize.tagline: 根據你的簡歷生成一封量身定做的求職信。

next.excerpt: Read RSS news as instagram stories! Discover the new way of reading news. This app uses many techniques to generate stories from feeds that don't support natively stories. It works with all yours feeds! Don't waste time for boring news apps.
next.title: Stories Now - Read RSS news as instagram stories! For iOS and Android. ☕

localize.description: 把RSS新闻当做instagram故事来读 发现阅读新闻的新方式。这个应用程序使用许多技术从不支持本地故事的feeds生成故事。它适用于所有你的feeds! 不要为无聊的新闻应用程序浪费时间。
localize.tagline: 阅读RSS新闻作为instagram故事 适用于iOS和Android。☕

localize.description: 把RSS新聞當做instagram故事來讀 發現閱讀新聞的新方式。這個應用程序使用許多技術從不支持本地故事的feeds生成故事。它適用於所有你的feeds! 不要爲無聊的新聞應用程序浪費時間。
localize.tagline: 閱讀RSS新聞作爲instagram故事 適用於iOS和Android。☕
